page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: IN SALISBURY THERE IS A FAIR AMOUNT OF ENTERTAINMENT. IN OUR BLOCK WE HAVE APPROXIMATELY FIVE KINDS OF ENTERTAINMENT. THE AMATEUR STUDIO THEATRE PRODUCE SHAKESPEAREAN PLAYS IN THE OPEN AIR AT OLD SARUM. THIS YEAR IT IS THE TEMPEST. AT CHRISTMAS EVERY YEAR OUR SCHOOL PUTS ON A NATIVITY PLAY. SOMETIMES CLASSES JOIN TOGETHER AND PUT ON ONE PLAY BUT SOMETIMES EACH CLASS PUTS ON ONE ON ITS OWN. WE HAVE A CONCERT WHERE THE CLASSES SING THE SONGS THAT HAVE BEEN LEARNED THROUGH THE YEAR. WE ALSO HAVE A FETE WITH BOYS AND GIRLS RACING. IN HUDSON FIELD EVERY YEAR A CIRCUS COMES FOR THREE DAYS. AT FIRST THE ENTRANCE FEE IS ONE POUND BUT THEN IT GOES UP TO THREE POUNDS. INSIDE PEOPLE COME ROUND AND GIVE YOU SWEETS ETC. WHILST THEY DO THIS THE ANIMALS DO THEIR PART.
